comment.body:
> [ulrichard](#comment_1_1PSaHi14Xh4Kjo3yyjDgbRtj4YLQgWV4QJ): What a fuckup. Not even the doctor giving his kidney to her could make this right.

Doctors are not different from car repair shop engineers. 
A few are working based on his conscience, and 
most are do whatever to suck the blood from the clients.

The only difference must be that doctors add more commission to his job, that is, they suck more blood from people.
